docs.snippet: WATER FOR BROOKLYN.--The City of Brooklyn holds an ovation to-day over the completion of her water-works. It is an event which fully deserves the pomp with which she proposes to celebrate it. Pure water, next to pure air, and equally with wholesome...
docs.lead_paragraph: WATER FOR BROOKLYN.--The City of Brooklyn holds an ovation to-day over the completion of her water-works. It is an event which fully deserves the pomp with which she proposes to celebrate it. Pure water, next to pure air, and equally with wholesome food, concerns the health and happiness of the people. The want of it has been hitherto the chief lack of Brooklyn:

docs.snippet: The Quarantine and sanitary Convention commenced its third annual meeting yesterday morning, at the building of the College of Physicians and surgeons, corner of Twenty-third-street and Third-avenue. A temporary organization was effected by calling...

headline.main: QUARANTINE AND SANITARY CONVENTION.; THE THIRD ANNUAL MEETING. First day's Proceedings.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Quarantine and sanitary Convention commenced its third annual meeting yesterday morning, at the building of the College of Physicians and surgeons, corner of Twenty-third-street and Third-avenue. A temporary organization was effected by calling Dr. WM. H. KEMP, of Baltimore, to act as Chairman, and Ex-Councilman CHARLES H. HASWELL, of this City, as Clerk.

docs.snippet: The closing scenes of the Sickles' trial were exceedingly impressive and exciting. The Jury retired at precisely ten minutes before 2 o'clock. The room was crowded with spectators, and instinctively every eye was turned towards the clock. Every...

headline.main: THE SICKLES TRAGEDY.; Trial of Daniel E. Sickles for the Murder of Philip Barton Key. TWENTIETH AND LAST DAY'S PROCEEDINGS. VERDICT OF NOT GUILTY. Extraordinary Scene of Excitement in the Court-room. NOW THE VERDICT WAS RECEIVED. Mr. Sickles Carried Off in Triumph by His Friends. CLOSING SCENES OF THE TRIAL.

docs.lead_paragraph: The closing scenes of the Sickles' trial were exceedingly impressive and exciting. The Jury retired at precisely ten minutes before 2 o'clock. The room was crowded with spectators, and instinctively every eye was turned towards the clock. Every minute that passed by was set down as fresh proof presumptive of a disagreement. The crowd gradually broke up into groups.

docs.snippet: It has been remarked that Sir E. C. LYTTON has not attended in this place in Parliament for some days. The reason of his absence is understood to be the failure of his health, owing to the assidulty with which he has unremittingly discharged the...

headline.main: Retirement of Sir E. R. Lytton.

docs.lead_paragraph: It has been remarked that Sir E. C. LYTTON has not attended in this place in Parliament for some days. The reason of his absence is understood to be the failure of his health, owing to the assidulty with which he has unremittingly discharged the duties of his office, and which has rendered imperative a temporary withdrawal from public affairs.

docs.snippet: The screw steamship City of Washington, Cap, PETRIO, which sailed from Liverpool at fouro'clock in the afternoon of the 13th of April arrived here at four o'clock yesterday afternoon. The cunard steamship Asia, from New York, arrived at Liverpool at...

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; Arrival of the City of Washington Cotton Fallen--Breadstuffs Dull--Consols 95 1-8. DEATH OF ALEXIS DE TOCQUEVILLE. Another French Exhortation to the German States. Declarations from Vienna and Berlin. Arrival of the City of Washington. UNRELAXING PREPARATIONS FOR WAR. The Stock Market Discovers a Chance for Peace.

docs.lead_paragraph: The screw steamship City of Washington, Cap, PETRIO, which sailed from Liverpool at fouro'clock in the afternoon of the 13th of April arrived here at four o'clock yesterday afternoon. The cunard steamship Asia, from New York, arrived at Liverpool at 2 P. M. on Sunday, the 10th of April.

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; EIGHTEENTH DAY'S PROCEEDINGS. THE SICKLES TRAGEDY. Trial of Daniel E. Sickles for the Murder of Philip Barton Key.

docs.lead_paragraph: The case is drawing fast to a close. To-morrow morning, Mr. BRADY will argue for the defence on the instructions, and will occupy two hours. Mr. OULD will follow for the presecution, and will occupy an hour and a half. The Judge will then either deliver his instructions or defer them to Tuesday, which latter is most probable.

docs.snippet: As we announced in the TIMES of yesterday morning, the Untied States revenue-cutter Harriet Lane, Captain FAUNCE, arrived at Quarantine on Wednesday evening. Yesterday she came to the Navy-Yard, where she is now anchored in the stream.

headline.main: FROM PARAGUAY.; The Festivities in Honor of the United States Commissioner. Interesting Account of the Journeyings in the Interior. Arrival of the Revenue-Cutter Harriet Lane.

docs.lead_paragraph: As we announced in the TIMES of yesterday morning, the Untied States revenue-cutter Harriet Lane, Captain FAUNCE, arrived at Quarantine on Wednesday evening. Yesterday she came to the Navy-Yard, where she is now anchored in the stream.
